pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open British Arboricultural Record Dataset // Data used in compiling the Handbook of UK Urban Tree Allometric Equations and Size Characteristics (Fennel 2024). The data include measurements of height, crown radius and diameter at breast height (DBH) for UK urban trees. For more details see Fennell (2024) Handbook of UK Urban Tree Allometric Equations and Size Characteristics (Version 1.4). doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.28745.04961.
